thread.section_title: Apex Temple Court Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of Apex Temple Court Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Veronica F
title: Excellent
text: We stayed here on the 24th when we visited London to see a show and visit family. The hotel met all our expectations, in terms of cleanliness, presentation and the staff were lovely, friendly and helpful. Food was good, and they were very accommodating by giving us dinner early so we could get to the theatre. Would definitely stay here again when visiting London. A real gem.
